snippet: A new interactive take on Mary Shelley's "Frankenstein" has jolted to life in Apple's App Store, courtesy of the New York Public Library.
abstract: A new interactive take on Mary Shelley's "Frankenstein" has jolted to life in Apple's App Store, courtesy of the New York Public Library.

headline.main: 'Frankenstein' Comes Alive in the App Store
headline.print_headline: A Sequel to the ‘Frankenstein’ iPad App
